meanings.definition: A group of lung diseases caused by the inhalation of dust particles.
meanings.sent1: Miners are at risk of developing pneumoconioses from breathing in coal dust.

meanings.sent5: The image of tiny dust particles causing pneumoconioses in the lungs stuck with him, making him wear a mask whenever cleaning.
